name: Spin Safari
description:
Immerse yourself in a most exotic puzzle game! Enjoy the hours of adventure that Spin Safari has to offer in over 100 free-to-play and fun levels!

Discover different regions of the world, from the jungle to the sea ice via the savanna and the ocean depths. Round the animals up and feed and care for them to achieve the best scores and beat your friends on Facebook.

Features of Spin Safari:
• Sumptuous and detailed graphics
• Explore 100 levels
• The game is easy to play using just one finger
• Rankings among friends
• Synchronization with Facebook
• Boosters available for excessively wild levels
